line=3095 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.6,178.295,391.521,189.268 iscore=0.19                                                                    :features. All seven will be treated as privative, which is to say that words may be
line=3096 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.6,165.404,391.461,176.377 iscore=0.12                                        :positively speciﬁed for them or may  be entirely unspeciﬁed  for them. Four of the
line=3097 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.54,152.454,391.471,163.426 iscore=0.29                                       :features are also multivalued, so that a positive speciﬁcation for the feature entails a
line=3098 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.59,139.563,391.441,150.536 iscore=0.21                                       :speciﬁcation for one of several permissible values of that feature. Notational conven-
line=3099 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-6.9,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.59,126.646,391.567,138.92 iscore=0.17:tions which will be used are: (i) F:Ø to indicate that a word is unspeciﬁed for feature F;
line=3100 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-6.9,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.636,113.646,391.546,124.668 iscore=0.28                  :(ii) +F to indicate that a word is positively speciﬁed for feature F; and (iii) F:v to
line=3101 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-6.9,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.636,100.746,391.488,111.727 iscore=0.29                  :indicate that a word is speciﬁed for value v of feature F. The seven features are as

doc_id=round-2013 page=88 block_id=88-5 bbox=57.58,98.712,391.553,264.718 label=b 3164 3176
line=3164 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.6,253.746,391.461,264.718                                         :it modiﬁes, and between a predicate DP and its subject. A morphological distinction
line=3165 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.6,240.795,391.481,253.795 iscore=0.15:can be made between  ‘thematic’ and ‘athematic’ case values, the signiﬁcance of which
line=3166 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHKIA+AdvPi1-11.4 bbox=57.58,227.904,391.441,239.801 iscore=0.33               :is discussed in }4.3.2. Tables 4.1 and 4.2 provide a brief characterization of the main
line=3167 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-6.9 bbox=57.6,214.946,391.507,225.926 iscore=0.20                                     :semantic  and grammatical  functions of the CASE values. The reader is referred to
line=3168 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.636,202.055,391.487,213.922 iscore=0.23                                 :pages of Evans (1995a) for more detailed descriptions and examples; see also Appen-
line=3169 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.636,189.104,374.75,202.104 iscore=0.23                           :dix A for equivalences between Evans’ analysis and the features employed here.
line=3170 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-6.9 bbox=67.585,176.213,391.523,187.218 iscore=0.15                                   :   Most values of Kayardild CASE are semantically rich, and the thematic values in
line=3171 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.632,163.295,391.553,174.268 iscore=0.23                                                       :particular have narrow  and specialized meanings  mostly pertaining to events of
line=3172 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.632,150.404,391.553,161.377 iscore=0.36                                                       :movement   and  transfer. What brings these disparate functions together as values
line=3173 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.632,137.454,391.473,148.426 iscore=0.23                                                       :of a single morphosyntactic feature is that they are all in paradigmatic opposition
line=3174 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.632,124.553,391.503,135.526 iscore=0.15                                                       :with one  another; they share the same kinds  of potential distribution across the
line=3175 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.632,111.662,391.553,122.635 iscore=0.14                                                       :words  in a sentence and  they associate with the same kinds of syntactic nodes,
line=3176 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.632,98.712,307.29,109.684 iscore=0.07                                                         :namely  DPs. These facts are explored further in later chapters.

line=3184 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.404,495.245,367.968,506.218 iscore=0.33                                         :and signals tense, aspect, and mood, and in some cases polarity and diathesis.
line=3185 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-6.9 bbox=67.363,482.246,391.301,493.267 iscore=0.00                     :   The semantic  and grammatical  functions of TAMT in Kayardild are, if anything,

line=3187 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.491,456.395,391.462,467.368 iscore=0.19                                         :coherent class in terms of how and where it is realized and distributed in the clause.
line=3188 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.491,443.494,391.372,454.467 iscore=0.06             :This in itself is interesting: the Kayardild inﬂectional system is tremendously compli-
line=3189 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.442,430.544,391.372,441.516 iscore=0.23                                         :cated but it is highly organized. Disparate semantic functions are channelled into just
line=3190 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.442,417.653,391.372,428.626 iscore=0.15                                         :a few distinct features whose regularities are shared. The analysis to be developed
line=3191 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.442,404.702,391.312,415.675 iscore=0.23                                         :here attempts to express precisely these regularities of organization in a maximally
line=3192 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.442,391.812,242.913,402.784 iscore=0.17                                         :perspicuous, informative, and elegant manner.

line=3362 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.6,578.795,86.344,589.768 iscore=0.07                                :factors.
line=3363 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=67.559,565.904,391.511,576.877 iscore=0.00                             :   The motivation for positing antagonistic pairs of feature values is twofold. First, an
line=3364 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.6,552.954,391.521,563.926 iscore=0.08                               :antagonistic relationship expresses a generalization in the morphology of Kayardild
line=3365 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.6,540.063,391.501,551.036 iscore=0.36                               :which  is not necessarily expected otherwise, namely that certain combinations of
line=3366 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.6,527.112,391.471,538.085 iscore=0.08                               :feature values are simply never realized together on a single word. Secondly, and
line=3367 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.6,514.212,391.441,525.184 iscore=0.15                               :more  importantly, the positing of antagonistic relationships in the Kayardild gram-

line=3371 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.613,462.495,391.49,475.495 iscore=0.18 :of morphological  realization the recognition of antagonistic, or ‘disjunctive’, or
line=3372 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.583,449.594,391.464,462.595 iscore=0.30:‘blocking’ relationships between morphosyntactic  features has a  long history in
line=3373 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.574,436.644,391.484,448.511 iscore=0.08       :morphological  theory  (Anderson  1986)  and as  we will see it permits powerful

doc_id=round-2013 page=94 block_id=94-3 bbox=57.527,123.655,391.543,397.484 label=btb 3376 3396

line=3377 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.657,369.094,391.508,382.094 iscore=0.22                                                                                   :Kayardild possesses a twin, and antagonistic, system of tense–aspect–mood–polarity
line=3378 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-6.9,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.647,356.193,391.453,368.52 iscore=0.27                                             :(TAM) inﬂection. That is to say, the TAM semantics of a Kayardild clause is inﬂection-
line=3379 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.612,343.295,391.503,354.268 iscore=0.13                                                                                                                :ally marked in two different ways, though only one kind of marking may appear on
line=3380 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.612,330.404,391.533,341.377 iscore=0.25                                                                                                                :any given word. The  analysis of these facts will be that each clause in Kayardild is
line=3381 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-6.9,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.612,317.446,391.529,330.446 iscore=0.38                                                               :associated with a single value of TAMT (the ‘thematic’ TAM feature), a single value of
line=3382 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-6.9,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.6,304.546,391.543,317.546 iscore=0.24                                             :TAMA (the ‘athematic’ feature), and a value of NEGATION. Let us refer to the set of TAM
line=3383 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-7.3,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-6.9,AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-11.0 bbox=57.6,290.797,391.49,302.698 iscore=0.24                                            :features {TAMT, TAMA, NEG} corresponding to given clause C, as TC, so that the set TC
line=3384 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-6.9 bbox=57.6,278.646,391.493,289.618 iscore=0.06                                                                                              :contains  an exhaustive representation of  the morphosyntactically relevant TAM
line=3385 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-6.9 bbox=57.6,265.746,391.428,276.718 iscore=0.31                                                                                              :semantics of clause C. Now, the feature TAMA stands in an antagonistic relationship
line=3386 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-7.3,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-6.9,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHKIA+AdvPi1-11.4,AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-11.0 bbox=57.527,251.997,391.529,264.743 iscore=0.17:to both TAMT and  NEG (cf }4.3.1) and thus of the three features in TC, for any given
line=3387 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-6.9 bbox=57.588,239.945,391.512,250.918 iscore=0.28                                                                                            :word  either (i) only TAMT and NEGATION will be realized; or (ii) only TAMA will be
line=3388 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.582,226.995,391.483,237.968 iscore=0.28                                                                                                                :realized; or (iii) none of the three may be realized; but it is impossible for all three to
line=3389 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-7.3 bbox=57.582,214.094,180.67,226.611 iscore=0.17                                                                                        :be realized on the same word.1
line=3390 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-7.3,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1,AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-11.0 bbox=67.55,200.297,391.449,212.198 iscore=0.12                                  :   Some  words in a sentence inﬂect for none of the features in TC and the complex
line=3391 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-7.3,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1,AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-11.0 bbox=57.538,187.397,391.497,199.247 iscore=0.19                                 :issue of whether or not  a given word  will inﬂect for features in TC is discussed
line=3392 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.557,175.345,391.517,187.212 iscore=0.38                                                              :in detail in Chapter 5. For the moment it will sufﬁce to observe that most words
line=3393 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-7.3,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1,AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-11.0 bbox=57.597,161.597,391.51,173.447 iscore=0.25                                  :within the verb phrase (VP) do inﬂect for features in TC while words outside the VP
line=3394 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.58,149.455,94.543,160.427 iscore=0.06                                                                                                                  :never do.
line=3395 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-6.9,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=67.539,136.504,391.53,147.518 iscore=0.07                                                                 :   As stated, some words inﬂect for TAMT/NEG, and others for TAMA. Which of these
line=3396 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.639,123.655,391.53,134.627 iscore=0.07                                                                                                                 :two possibilities obtains follows straightforwardly from the morphomic composition

doc_id=round-2013 page=99 block_id=99-2 bbox=57.42,578.795,391.351,604.746 label=tb 3567 3568
line=3567 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.43,591.746,391.351,604.746:itself. Chapters 5–9 are devoted to an examination of those complexities, and their
line=3568 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.42,578.795,90.577,589.768 iscore=0.08                                        :analysis.

doc_id=round-2013 page=99 block_id=99-3 bbox=57.43,546.378,292.01,559.341 label=btt 3569 3569
line=3569 fonts=AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-12.1,AGHLBP+AdvP445C83-10.2 bbox=57.43,546.378,292.01,559.341:4.5 Surface syntax, non-surface syntax, and concord

doc_id=round-2013 page=99 block_id=99-4 bbox=57.43,514.195,391.42,538.118 label=btb 3570 3571
line=3570 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.43,527.146,391.42,538.118                                                              :We  proceed now to an initial introduction to the issues relating to Kayardild syntax
line=3571 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.43,514.195,347.5,527.195 iscore=0.36:and the approaches to them which will be expanded on in Chapters 5–9.

doc_id=round-2013 page=99 block_id=99-5 bbox=57.41,265.75,391.46,500.42 label=bbt 3572 3589
line=3572 fonts=AGHJHL+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I-11.0,AGHKOP+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I+fb-9.5,AGHLFA+AdvP48E56A-9.4 bbox=57.5,488.344,175.913,500.42:4.5.1 Kayardild syntax, brieﬂy
line=3573 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.47,472.451,391.45,483.424 iscore=0.06                                         :The main  predicate of a Kayardild clause is either a single verb, or a set of verbs with
line=3574 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.47,459.56,391.44,470.533 iscore=0.11                                          :non-contradictory argument  structures, or a predicate DP. A verb of transfer or
line=3575 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.47,446.61,391.37,457.583 iscore=0.21                                          :movement   may be elided if its meaning is recoverable from context. Verbs can take
line=3576 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.47,433.719,391.4,444.692 iscore=0.14                                          :up to two syntactic complement DPs  and they may  subcategorize for various non-
line=3577 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.47,420.769,391.46,431.741 iscore=0.23                                         :complement  arguments. The complement   DPs can be promoted to subject in passive
line=3578 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.47,407.868,391.46,418.84 iscore=0.08                                          :clauses and can be syntactically topicalized. They can also be syntactically focalized,
line=3579 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.47,394.917,391.38,405.89 iscore=0.06              :as can the subject DP. Word order within DPs is ﬁxed, but the order of verbs and DPs
line=3580 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,382.016,391.4,392.989 iscore=0.17                                          :within the clause is free, to the extent that any order is possible even if not equally
line=3581 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,369.066,391.37,380.039 iscore=0.12                                         :likely or appropriate in all contexts. The word order of particles is more constrained
line=3582 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.46,356.175,391.42,367.148 iscore=0.36             :and is deﬁned in terms of the edges of other surface-syntactic constituents. DPs are
line=3583 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,343.224,391.45,354.197 iscore=0.21                                         :freely elided when their reference is recoverable from context. It is not uncommon
line=3584 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.46,330.334,391.321,341.306 iscore=0.31            :for multiple, identically inﬂected DPs to be juxtaposed in a  single clause. DP
line=3585 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.41,317.433,391.351,328.405 iscore=0.23                                        :juxtaposition has several functions including apposition, conjunction, and disjunc-
line=3586 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.41,304.482,391.38,315.455 iscore=0.14                                         :tion. An array of embedded structures is attested. DPs can contain embedded DPs or
line=3587 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.41,291.591,391.37,302.564 iscore=0.14             :embedded   VPs as modiﬁers, and predicate DPs can take full embedded clauses as
line=3588 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.43,278.641,391.37,291.641 iscore=0.15            :complements.  Clauses themselves can contain embedded ‘adverbial’ VP adjuncts and
line=3589 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,265.75,266.338,276.723 iscore=0.20                                         :main  verbs can take embedded clause complements.

doc_id=round-2013 page=99 block_id=99-6 bbox=57.46,81.878,391.44,251.975 label=bbb 3590 3602
line=3590 fonts=AGHJHL+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I-11.0,AGHKOP+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I+fb-9.5,AGHLFA+AdvP48E56A-9.4 bbox=57.46,239.899,264.002,251.975                                  :4.5.2 Non-surface syntax in the account of inﬂection
line=3591 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,224.006,391.41,234.979 iscore=0.07                                                                             :Because DPs  and verbs are freely ordered within the clause there is no constituent in
line=3592 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,211.056,391.38,222.028 iscore=0.13                                                                             :the clause which is both larger than the DP and consistently contiguous other than
line=3593 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,198.155,391.39,209.127 iscore=0.33                                                                             :the clause itself. However, the central claim of the remainder of this chapter is this:
line=3594 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,185.204,391.41,196.177 iscore=0.13                                                                             :morphosyntactic  features in Kayardild are always associated with sets of words which
line=3595 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,172.313,391.43,183.286 iscore=0.17                                                                             :relate to one another in a strict, hierarchically embedded fashion. Discontinuity on
line=3596 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,159.363,299.614,170.336 iscore=0.25                                                                            :the surface masks an intricately embedded underlying order.
line=3597 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=67.419,146.472,391.43,157.445 iscore=0.00                                                                            :   If we refer to the set of words on which a morphosyntactic feature is realized as
line=3598 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4,AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-11.0 bbox=57.46,133.571,391.39,146.571 iscore=0.12:that feature’s domain (Dench and Evans  1988), then once the effects of antagonism
line=3599 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHKIA+AdvPi1-11.4 bbox=57.47,120.621,391.39,132.518 iscore=0.14                                    :(}4.3) have been factored out the domains  of features in Kayardild relate to one
line=3600 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.47,107.72,391.39,118.693 iscore=0.14                                                                              :another  precisely like hierarchically embedded syntactic constituents. Moreover,
line=3601 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.47,94.769,391.39,105.742 iscore=0.25                                                                              :these constituents are not random   assemblages of  words. Despite the fact that
line=3602 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.47,81.878,391.44,92.851 iscore=0.21                                                                               :there is no evidence from surface word order for constituents such as VP (Evans

line=3644 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.475,511.251,391.406,522.224 iscore=0.08                                                         :I will assume that non-surface syntactic structures conform to the general X-bar
line=3645 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.475,498.351,391.376,510.218 iscore=0.13                                   :schema  shown  in Figure 4.1. This analysis is chosen partly in order that the general-

line=3648 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHJOA+AdvP4C4E74-12.0 bbox=57.373,433.745,391.455,471.475 iscore=0.20            :anothernodesSomethingS andX0 nodeS00of. The. an exceptionsole immediateto theconstituentgeneral X-ofbarS isstructureVP, whileofSFigure00 acts mostly4.1 are likethe
line=3649 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=67.366,420.795,391.348,431.768 iscore=0.27                                                         :   For two reasons, I do not assume branching to be binary. First, since DP juxtapos-
line=3650 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.407,407.904,391.288,418.877 iscore=0.13                             :ition is not uncommon,  and since there is no evidence (from inﬂection) of internal
line=3651 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.358,394.954,391.219,405.926 iscore=0.43                                                         :hierarchical structure among juxtaposed DPs, it is appropriate to treat all juxtaposed
line=3652 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.358,382.063,391.298,393.036 iscore=0.12                                                         :DPs  as sisters. As a consequence, if a given XP permits one DP daughter then it will
line=3653 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.358,369.112,391.278,380.085 iscore=0.24                                                         :also permit multiple, juxtaposed DP   daughters. Second, we  will encounter large
line=3654 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.358,356.212,391.238,367.184 iscore=0.17                             :classes of clausal adjunct DPs, all of which exhibit identical inﬂectional properties.
line=3655 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.348,343.261,391.258,354.234 iscore=0.08                             :Even  though  these are not necessarily juxtaposed their inﬂectional behaviour is
line=3656 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.298,330.37,391.268,341.343 iscore=0.07                                                          :indistinct from that of true juxtaposed DPs and their analysis in terms of non-surface
line=3657 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.298,317.469,386.339,328.442 iscore=0.06                                                         :syntax will be the same, that is, they will be sisters under a common mother node.
line=3658 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=67.257,304.519,391.248,315.491 iscore=0.20                                                         :   Although some  adjuncts will be analysed as sisters, there are other cases where the
line=3659 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.298,291.618,391.219,302.591 iscore=0.29                             :inﬂectional evidence calls for a hierarchical analysis. As will we see shortly the non-
line=3660 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.298,278.667,391.308,291.668 iscore=0.21:surface syntactic structure of Kayardild—posited on  the basis of inﬂectional evi-
line=3661 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.368,265.777,391.358,278.777 iscore=0.12                            :dence—is  at its most intricate at the level of adjuncts, in particular at the level of DP
line=3662 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.368,252.826,207.228,263.799 iscore=0.12                                                         :adjuncts to VP and S-category nodes.

doc_id=round-2013 page=103 block_id=103-10 bbox=57.369,132.544,391.449,380.129 label=btbb 3712 3730
line=3712 fonts=AGHJHL+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I-11.0,AGHLFA+AdvP48E56A-9.4 bbox=57.369,368.163,257.213,380.129                :4.5.7 Other approaches to layered clausal structure
line=3713 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.369,352.27,391.31,363.243 iscore=0.13                              :Although  it is beyond the scope of this book to make more than passing comment,
line=3714 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.369,339.38,391.369,351.247 iscore=0.40       :the layered view of Kayardild clause structure in Figure 4.2 above, which is posited on
line=3715 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.449,326.429,391.449,337.402 iscore=0.40:the basis of evidence from inﬂection, can be compared   with the layered clause
line=3716 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.439,313.538,391.419,324.511 iscore=0.15                            :structure which  has gained acceptance within  Chomksyan   generative grammar
line=3717 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.439,300.588,391.31,311.56 iscore=0.29                              :over the past two decades. Although the latter is based on quite different empirical
line=3718 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.439,287.687,391.379,299.554 iscore=0.36      :data and theoretical arguments, researchers such as Pollock (1989), Chomsky (1991),
line=3719 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.419,274.736,391.3,286.603 iscore=0.15        :and Cinque  (1999) among others have argued that clauses possess a more articulated
line=3720 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.419,261.845,391.399,272.818 iscore=0.23                            :hierarchical structure than was assumed in earlier models of generative grammar
line=3721 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.419,248.895,391.359,260.762 iscore=0.09      :(Chomsky   1965, 1986). Although more recent work has predominantly  postulated
line=3722 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.419,236.004,391.31,246.977 iscore=0.08                             :phrases whose heads have no  overt realization, the seminal arguments for splitting
line=3723 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.419,223.113,391.34,234.98 iscore=0.17        :the IP constituent made  by Pollock (1989) focused on  syntactic consistuents in
line=3724 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.399,210.163,391.379,221.135 iscore=0.33                            :English and French whose heads correlate with visible tense and agreement morph-
line=3725 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.399,197.272,391.32,208.244 iscore=0.08                             :ology. Those proposals thus share a modicum of commonality  with the arguments
line=3726 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.399,184.321,391.379,195.294 iscore=0.27                            :I will present for Kayardild, insofar as the layering of clause structure relates in some
line=3727 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-7.3 bbox=57.399,171.346,391.38,183.911 iscore=0.20    :way  to overtly realized, tense-like morphosyntactic features.5 By the same token
line=3728 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.469,158.395,391.35,169.368 iscore=0.18 :though  there are signiﬁcant differences between the model of Kayardild syntax
line=3729 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.469,145.494,391.33,156.467 iscore=0.09                             :proposed  here  and  mainstream   Chomksyan    research into articulated clause
line=3730 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.469,132.544,95.187,143.516 iscore=0.11                             :structure.

doc_id=round-2013 page=103 block_id=103-11 bbox=57.419,75.395,391.472,113.789 label=bb 3731 3734
line=3731 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-5.9,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-5.5,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-7.5,AGHKIA+AdvPi1-9.1 bbox=65.4,103.757,221.427,113.789:   4 The order of μOBL can be exceptional, cf }2.6.4.
line=3732 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-5.9,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8 bbox=65.4,94.287,391.472,104.379 iscore=0.20                                                 :   5 Layered clause structure has also been invoked in generative accounts of scrambling (e.g. Thráinsson
line=3733 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-7.5 bbox=57.419,84.841,391.432,94.334 iscore=0.25                                                   :2001), an empirical phenomenon  in which DPs  are freely rearranged. As noted earlier, DPs in Kayardild
line=3734 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8 bbox=57.419,75.395,250.223,84.173 iscore=0.19                                                                         :surface syntax also exhibit something akin to this behaviour.

doc_id=round-2013 page=104 block_id=104-1 bbox=148.4,621.417,391.579,633.987 label=tt 3735 3735
line=3735 fonts=AGHJHL+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I-11.5,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.8,AGHLFA+AdvP48E56A-9.9 bbox=148.4,621.417,391.579,633.987:                     4.5 Surface syntax, non-surface syntax, and concord   83

doc_id=round-2013 page=104 block_id=104-2 bbox=57.526,436.701,391.522,602.718 label=tbt 3736 3748
line=3736 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=67.55,591.746,391.482,602.718                                          :   In Kayardild the features which attach to each of the several nodes in the clause or
line=3737 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.591,578.795,391.492,589.768 iscore=0.31                             :in the DP  are assumed  to do so because  from that one structural position they
line=3738 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.591,565.904,391.522,576.877 iscore=0.20                             :percolate downwards   to many  words, sometimes  very many  words, often spread
line=3739 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.591,552.954,391.512,563.926 iscore=0.15                             :across several subordinate XP domains.  By way  of contrast, the clausal layers of
line=3740 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.591,540.063,391.472,551.036 iscore=0.23                             :recent generative theory are typically associated with features that trigger the move-
line=3741 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-7.3 bbox=57.591,527.112,391.446,539.711 iscore=0.27    :ment  of just one element (whether an X0 head  or a higher projection) into some
line=3742 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.566,514.245,391.437,525.218 iscore=0.27                             :domain  associated with that feature, and thus the interaction between a clausal node
line=3743 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.566,501.344,391.486,512.317 iscore=0.23                             :and the rest of the clause is highly circumscribed. Actual morphological agreement
line=3744 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.566,488.394,391.456,501.394 iscore=0.25:has recently been pursued  in relation to a quite different, long-distance ‘Agree’
line=3745 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.526,475.503,391.437,487.37 iscore=0.08        :operation (Chomsky   2000), although even  here the focus remains on agreement
line=3746 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.576,462.552,391.446,473.525 iscore=0.36 :between a trigger and one speciﬁc target. In Kayardild, the positing of layered clausal
line=3747 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.566,449.651,391.417,462.652 iscore=0.36:structure is fundamentally driven  by the existence of triggers whose ‘target’ is
line=3748 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.526,436.701,198.65,447.673 iscore=0.08                              :everything that its node dominates.

doc_id=round-2013 page=104 block_id=104-3 bbox=57.486,239.962,391.57,422.816 label=tbb 3749 3762
line=3749 fonts=AGHJHL+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I-11.0,AGHLFA+AdvP48E56A-9.4 bbox=57.526,410.849,220.685,422.816                :4.5.8 Word  classes and phrasal categories
line=3750 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.526,394.957,391.387,405.93 iscore=0.18                             :The  present analysis of Kayardild distinguishes between just two lexical, morpho-
line=3751 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-11.0 bbox=57.526,382.056,391.397,393.108 iscore=0.25  :logical word classes: nominals and verbals. In terms of their morphomic compos-
line=3752 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.486,369.106,391.417,380.078 iscore=0.14                            :ition, lexical verbal stems end formally in a thematic, while lexical nominal stems do
line=3753 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.486,356.215,391.407,367.187 iscore=0.07                            :not. In terms of syntax, verbal stems provide the base for words which are syntactic-
line=3754 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.486,343.264,391.387,354.237 iscore=0.33                            :ally verbal, and nominal stems the base for words which are syntactically nominal. In
line=3755 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.486,330.373,391.407,341.346 iscore=0.14                            :addition to these morphologically grounded nominal and verbal superclasses though,
line=3756 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-7.3 bbox=57.486,317.482,391.57,330.011 iscore=0.18    :the analysis of Kayardild syntax presented here also recognizes syntactic subclasses.6
line=3757 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=67.55,304.546,391.512,315.518 iscore=0.07                             :   To begin with nominals, the words which are built upon nominal lexical stems can
line=3758 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.591,291.655,391.442,302.627 iscore=0.21                            :be divided into several syntactic subclasses, members of which can occupy distinct
line=3759 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.591,278.704,391.402,290.571 iscore=0.08      :types of syntactic positions (cf Evans 1995a:236). A primary division can be made
line=3760 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.502,265.813,391.382,276.786 iscore=0.31                            :between  subclasses which participate in non-surface syntactic structures and which
line=3761 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.502,252.863,391.422,263.836 iscore=0.30:consequently may  become  associated with morphosyntactic features and so inﬂect,
line=3762 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.551,239.962,391.412,250.935 iscore=0.17                            :and  those which do not participate in non-surface syntactic structures and which

doc_id=round-2013 page=104 block_id=104-4 bbox=57.597,75.395,391.69,217.689 label=b 3763 3777
line=3763 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-5.9,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8 bbox=65.57,207.657,391.515,217.689                                                                  :   6 This correspondence  between  a small number   of morphological  classes and a larger number  of
line=3764 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-7.5 bbox=57.597,198.211,391.634,207.704 iscore=0.19                                                        :syntactic classes is typical of many Australian languages (Blake 1987:2 3). In the present study syntactic
line=3765 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8 bbox=57.668,188.765,391.602,197.543 iscore=0.19                                                                              :subclasses are posited with the aim  of accounting for why  certain morphosyntactic  features end up
line=3766 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8 bbox=57.668,179.319,391.626,188.097 iscore=0.27                                                                              :associating with the words they do. In taking this (morpho)syntactically-driven approach, the current
line=3767 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-7.4 bbox=57.668,169.873,391.674,179.367 iscore=0.13                                                        :analysis more closely resembles the general approach to Australian languages taken by Blake (1987, 2001),
line=3768 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-7.4 bbox=57.724,160.428,391.666,169.921 iscore=0.19                                                        :than  by Dixon (1980) who  also places semantic properties at the forefront. Nevertheless, I depart from
line=3769 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-7.4,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-8.4,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-5.7 bbox=57.724,150.982,391.666,161.382 iscore=0.24:Blake’s (2001) practice by deﬁning syntactic phrases (DP, AP, etc.) in terms of the syntactic subclasses (D,
line=3770 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-7.5 bbox=57.716,141.536,391.69,151.03 iscore=0.18                                                          :A, etc.) of their heads rather than the broader morphological classes (nominal, verbal). In Evans (1995a)
line=3771 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-7.5,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-8.4,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-5.7 bbox=57.716,132.09,391.65,142.49 iscore=0.28   :word  classes are stated to be ‘based on the sufﬁxing possibilities for each word’ (1995a:84ff). Taken at face
line=3772 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8 bbox=57.724,122.645,391.674,131.422 iscore=0.11                                                                              :value  this resembles the criteria used here for morphological  classes. In practice though, semantic
line=3773 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-7.4 bbox=57.724,113.199,391.682,122.692 iscore=0.19                                                        :properties play a non-trivial role in distinguishing word classes from one another in Evans (1995a) and
line=3774 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-5.5,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-7.4,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-5.7 bbox=57.78,103.753,391.501,113.246 iscore=0.06         :in some cases pre-empt considerations from morphosyntax: some particles in Evans (1995a) inﬂect for TAMA
line=3775 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8 bbox=57.6,94.287,391.606,103.064 iscore=0.21                                                                                 :while others do not, yet they are treated as one word class presumably on  the basis of their function;
line=3776 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-5.7 bbox=57.6,84.841,391.574,93.619 iscore=0.21                                                      :conjunctions and interjections are similar in their failure to inﬂect, yet they are treated as two classes, and
line=3777 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-5.7 bbox=57.624,75.395,223.855,84.173 iscore=0.06                                                    :both are distinguished from non-inﬂecting particles.

doc_id=round-2013 page=105 block_id=105-1 bbox=57.43,621.417,180.601,634.102 label=t 3778 3778
line=3778 fonts=AGHJHL+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I-11.5,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.8,AGHKOP+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I+fb-10.0 bbox=57.43,621.417,180.601,634.102:84     Correlates of inﬂection

doc_id=round-2013 page=105 block_id=105-2 bbox=57.42,307.53,391.51,602.718 label=bt 3779 3801
line=3779 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.43,591.746,391.37,602.718                                         :therefore do not inﬂect. In the former group are determiners D,  numbers  Num,
line=3780 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.44,578.795,391.361,589.768 iscore=0.31                                                        :adjectives A, and nouns  N. These  all appear in (subconstituents of) determiner
line=3781 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.44,565.904,391.291,576.877 iscore=0.17                                                        :phrases. In the latter group are clitic particles, interjections and ideophones (particles
line=3782 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHKIA+AdvPi1-11.4 bbox=57.44,552.954,391.37,564.851 iscore=0.23                :are discussed in }4.5.9). With respect to interjections and ideophones I assume that
line=3783 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.43,540.063,391.39,551.036 iscore=0.29                                                         :neither of these classes of words participates in syntactic structures and that this is
line=3784 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.43,527.112,149.256,538.085 iscore=0.14                            :why  they fail to inﬂect.
line=3785 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=67.379,514.212,391.361,525.184 iscore=0.00                                                       :   Words  built upon verbal lexical stems fall into two syntactic subtypes: verbs V and
line=3786 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.42,501.321,384.612,512.293 iscore=0.14                                                        :adverbs Adv, both of which always participate in non-surface syntactic structures.
line=3787 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=67.379,488.37,391.4,499.343 iscore=0.25                              :   Several nominal and verbal lexemes are able to function, with modiﬁed semantics,
line=3788 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJHL+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I-11.0 bbox=57.49,475.479,391.44,486.452 iscore=0.15                             :in more than one syntactic subclass. For example, warngiij- functions as D meaning
line=3789 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJHL+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.539,462.529,391.4,475.529 iscore=0.15:‘a certain’, as Num meaning ‘one’ and as A meaning  ‘common,  shared’; kuruluth-
line=3790 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.559,449.638,391.51,462.638 iscore=0.21     :functions as V meaning ‘kill’ and as Adv meaning ‘do intensely’ (Evans 1995a:86, 237).
line=3791 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.549,436.687,391.47,447.66 iscore=0.14                                                         :Because the multiple syntactic subclasses of these words all correspond to a single
line=3792 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.549,423.796,391.46,434.769 iscore=0.31                                                        :morphological superclass though, there is no derivational morphology which signals
line=3793 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.549,410.846,391.46,423.846 iscore=0.29                           :a ‘shift’ between one syntactic subclass and the next, rather the exact same lexical
line=3794 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.549,397.955,391.48,408.928 iscore=0.07                                                        :stem is used in each syntactic function. Accordingly, disambiguation of the intended
line=3795 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.549,385.064,391.5,396.037 iscore=0.19                                                         :meaning  of such lexemes relies on context, a matter which will play a central role in
line=3796 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.549,372.114,263.943,383.981 iscore=0.12                                 :arguments  for the existence of the DP in Chapter 6.
line=3797 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=67.468,359.223,391.46,370.195 iscore=0.10                                                        :   Corresponding  to the syntactic subclasses of Kayardild the following phrasal
line=3798 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.51,346.272,391.42,357.245 iscore=0.10                                                         :categories will be recognized: determiner phrases  DP, number   phrases NumP,
line=3799 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.51,333.381,391.4,344.354 iscore=0.33                                                          :adjective phrases AP,  noun  phrases NP,  verb phrases VP,  and  adverb phrases
line=3800 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.51,320.431,391.44,331.404 iscore=0.15                                                         :AdvP.  A comparison  between the word classes and syntactic phrases used here and
line=3801 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.51,307.53,258.009,319.397 iscore=0.23                                   :those of Evans (1995a) is provided in Appendix A.

doc_id=round-2013 page=105 block_id=105-3 bbox=57.419,97.762,391.45,293.645 label=bb 3802 3816
line=3802 fonts=AGHJHL+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I-11.0,AGHLFA+AdvP48E56A-9.4 bbox=57.51,281.679,262.193,293.645                 :4.5.9 Surface syntax, particles, and particle-like DPs
line=3803 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.51,265.786,391.44,278.786 iscore=0.15 :Although  Kayardild word order is notionally ‘free’, strong biases in actual word order
line=3804 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,252.836,391.43,263.808 iscore=0.33                              :are readily apparent and while the exploration of such matters is beyond the scope of
line=3805 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,239.935,391.45,250.908 iscore=0.33                              :this study I assume that pragmatic and discourse factors play a key role in determin-
line=3806 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,226.984,391.39,237.957 iscore=0.20                              :ing or at least restricting surface word order (for recent overviews of research into
line=3807 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.46,214.093,391.39,225.961 iscore=0.21        :pragmatically determined  word   order in Australian languages  see Austin 2001;
line=3808 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.46,201.193,391.41,213.06 iscore=0.29         :Mushin  2005; Baker and Mushin  2008). To mention but one example, it is common
line=3809 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.42,188.242,391.38,199.215 iscore=0.20                              :for a sequence of juxtaposed, coreferential DPs referring to a place to begin with a
line=3810 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.42,175.341,391.361,186.314 iscore=0.20                             :demonstrative  (i.e. deictic) DP, and be followed by a more semantically contentful
line=3811 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.42,162.346,391.379,174.258 iscore=0.38       :DP.  Examples  appear in (5.15), (6.23), and (7.12). Beyond these general biases in
line=3812 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.419,149.455,391.349,160.427 iscore=0.07                            :surface word order, however, it is possible to identify a small number of Kayardild
line=3813 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.419,136.504,391.319,147.477 iscore=0.29                            :words  whose surface word order is yet more strongly constrained, and which never
line=3814 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.419,123.613,391.329,134.586 iscore=0.23:inﬂect. The  analysis proposed here is that these words  constitute the syntactic,
line=3815 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-11.0 bbox=57.419,110.663,391.289,121.715 iscore=0.33  :particle subclass of the morphological superclass of nominals; particles do not appear
line=3816 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.419,97.762,391.369,108.735 iscore=0.15                             :at all in non-surface syntactic structure, but rather are introduced directly into the

doc_id=round-2013 page=106 block_id=106-1 bbox=148.4,621.417,391.579,633.987 label=tt 3817 3817

doc_id=round-2013 page=106 block_id=106-2 bbox=57.506,540.063,391.427,604.311 label=tbt 3818 3822
line=3818 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-7.3,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-11.0 bbox=57.6,591.746,391.427,604.311:surface syntax as special clitics7 (Anderson 2005; Zwicky 1977), appearing at the
line=3819 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.506,578.795,391.377,589.768 iscore=0.25                                                           :edges of certain surface-syntactic domains. Because particles are absent from non-
line=3820 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.506,565.904,391.427,576.877 iscore=0.18                                                           :surface syntactic structure, they are not assigned morphosyntactic features and they
line=3821 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.506,552.954,391.377,563.926 iscore=0.13                               :do not inﬂect. A discussion of the syntax of particles, which has not previously been

doc_id=round-2013 page=106 block_id=106-3 bbox=57.516,459.587,391.427,526.178 label=tbbtt 3823 3827
line=3823 fonts=AGHJHL+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I-11.0,AGHLFA+AdvP48E56A-9.4 bbox=57.516,514.212,242.64,526.178           :4.5.10 DP constituents with predicative content
line=3824 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.516,498.319,391.427,509.292 iscore=0.23                      :There are two kinds of predicative constituents in Kayardild which will be analysed
line=3825 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.516,485.369,391.407,496.341 iscore=0.33                      :here as DPs. It is not apparent from casual inspection that these constituents ought to

doc_id=round-2013 page=106 block_id=106-5 bbox=57.518,316.447,391.438,379.103 label=tbbbt 3833 3837
line=3833 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.537,368.13,391.438,379.103                                   :Here, as in many Kayardild clauses, the main clausal predicate shown in bold is not
line=3834 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.537,355.18,391.438,367.047 iscore=0.24 :verbal but nominal. The question is, is the predicate in (4.11) a full DP, or perhaps an
line=3835 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.518,342.289,391.438,353.261 iscore=0.24                      :NP, or just an AP? Likewise we can consider depictive second predicates, which may
line=3836 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.518,329.338,391.388,341.205 iscore=0.19:be nominal (4.12) or clausal (4.13). Are these simple NPs and VPs, or are they NPs

doc_id=round-2013 page=123 block_id=123-7 bbox=57.353,149.463,391.442,290.505 label=btbbb 4447 4457
line=4447 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.432,278.637,391.422,290.505:Evans (1995a:161) weighs up two potential analyses for the constructions identiﬁed here
line=4448 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.353,265.737,391.383,276.709 iscore=0.12          :as instrument purpose adverbial clauses: the ﬁrst as a clause, and the second as a series of
line=4449 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8 bbox=57.383,252.786,391.393,265.061 iscore=0.24                  :juxtaposed case:utilitive DPs and derivationally nominalized verbs. For the latter
line=4450 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.383,239.895,391.432,252.895 iscore=0.40         :alternative, the overall ‘instrument purpose’ meaning ought to arise compositionally
line=4451 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8 bbox=57.363,226.945,391.333,239.219 iscore=0.17                  :from the meanings of the individual case-marked nouns and nominalized verbs. Evans
line=4452 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.383,214.054,391.283,225.026 iscore=0.38                                      :observes that the former  analysis would accord  better with the semantics of the
line=4453 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-7.3 bbox=57.383,201.146,391.413,213.711 iscore=0.14             :construction,14 but opts for the latter on the grounds that it avoids imputing multiple
line=4454 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8 bbox=57.412,188.195,391.43,200.47 iscore=0.14                    :functions to nominals marked with μutil and verbs marked with μn. A central theme
line=4455 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.432,175.304,391.353,186.277 iscore=0.21                                      :of this book, however, is that polyfunctionality is ubiquitous in Kayardild and so the
line=4456 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.432,162.354,391.343,173.326 iscore=0.14                                      :avoidance  of it is little reason to opt for a semantically less advantageous analysis.
line=4457 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8 bbox=57.432,149.463,391.442,161.738 iscore=0.33                  :I therefore adopt a clausal analysis, in which μutil realizes tama and μn realizes tamt.

doc_id=round-2013 page=123 block_id=123-8 bbox=57.415,52.999,391.444,129.189 label=bb 4458 4465
line=4458 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-5.9,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJHL+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I-8.8,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-7.5,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-5.7 bbox=65.4,119.157,391.42,129.189:   13 This sentence was recorded by Wurm (1960) and contains a rather long pause after the ﬁrst wumbur-
line=4459 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJHL+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I-8.8,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-7.4 bbox=57.454,109.711,391.444,119.204 iscore=0.11                                      :umarr.  Both Evans (1995a) and Round  (2009) analyse only the portion after the pause, resulting in the
line=4460 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8 bbox=57.43,100.265,391.349,109.043 iscore=0.29                                                                                        :interpretation of the embedded clause as a main clause. Taking into account the full context, the generaliza-
line=4461 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-7.9,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-5.7 bbox=57.43,90.819,382.03,100.639 iscore=0.12                                          :tion emerges, that instrument purpose clauses are always embedded and always inﬂect for matrix tama.
line=4462 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-5.9,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-5.7 bbox=65.4,81.337,391.357,91.369 iscore=0.20                                      :   14 The difﬁculty for the juxtapositional alternative is that the desired semantics are not derivable
line=4463 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-7.5 bbox=57.43,71.891,391.365,81.384 iscore=0.00                                                                    :compositionally. Although  nominalized verbs in Kayardild  can denote instruments (Evans  1995a:458),
line=4464 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-7.5 bbox=57.415,62.445,391.396,71.939 iscore=0.06                                                                   :they must take their middle form to do so. The would-be nominalized verbs in sentences like (5.24) (5.26)
line=4465 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-8.4 bbox=57.43,52.999,288.948,63.399 iscore=0.11                                                              :are all active and so cannot contribute the ‘instrument’ reading required.

line=4468 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=57.561,578.795,391.472,591.07 iscore=0.00          :(1995:170) analyses this construction as juxtaposed case:translative DPs and nominal-
line=4469 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.571,565.904,391.601,576.877 iscore=0.29                                                   :ized verbs. Based on the sample of sentences Evans adduces the analysis is semantically
line=4470 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-7.3 bbox=57.571,552.946,391.572,565.511 iscore=0.29                          :plausible,15 but my own expanded corpus contains additional senses which cannot be
line=4471 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.572,540.055,391.492,551.027 iscore=0.38                                                   :reconciled with the juxtapositional analysis, and so I adopt a clausal analysis. Incipient
line=4472 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.572,527.104,391.562,538.077 iscore=0.43                                                   :clauses have a range of functions whose common   semantic basis appears to be the
line=4473 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.572,514.203,391.562,525.176 iscore=0.12                                                   :denotation of an event which will occur soon after the event in the main clause. From

line=4477 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.502,462.511,391.413,475.511 iscore=0.20  :clause] and then [incipient clause]’. Incipient clauses associate inherently with tama:

line=4553 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8 bbox=57.491,472.248,391.342,484.523 iscore=0.25                                                 :adnominal  embedded  VPs  (those associated with tamt:resultative) have what Evans

line=4555 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.491,446.406,391.371,457.379 iscore=0.27                                                                     :verbs are active but those headed by transitive verbs are passive (even though the verb
line=4556 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.491,433.516,391.411,445.79 iscore=0.20                      :is not marked with the usual μmid middle/passive sufﬁx), thus it is their logical object

line=4786 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.6,565.904,391.501,576.877 iscore=0.12                                                   :free to occur in active embedded VPs. As one would expect, one of these DP types is

line=4791 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.61,501.321,364.178,512.293 iscore=0.18                                                  :since both their existence and their nature is typological rather idiosyncratic.

doc_id=round-2013 page=132 block_id=132-6 bbox=57.391,77.885,391.579,309.448 label=bbb 4809 4826

line=4810 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.598,284.645,269.856,295.618 iscore=0.14                                                                                          :and also to direct objects and location-denoting DPs.
line=4811 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHKIA+AdvPi1-11.4 bbox=67.557,271.694,391.499,283.591 iscore=0.08                                                 :   In }5.1.2 we saw that topicalization applies to direct objects, their secondary
line=4812 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8 bbox=57.598,258.803,391.579,271.078 iscore=0.17                                                                      :predicates and to DPs  denoting locations (the latter in case:locative). Curiously,
line=4813 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.618,245.853,391.499,258.853 iscore=0.15                                                             :topicalization also applies to ‘instruments’ in passive clauses, or put another way, to
line=4814 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.598,232.962,391.499,243.935 iscore=0.23                                                                                          :non-human   demoted  logical subjects. Why non-human demoted  subjects, of all DP
line=4815 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.598,220.012,391.43,230.984 iscore=0.09                                                                                           :types, should be susceptible to topicalization requires some comment. The reasons
line=4816 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.598,207.111,153.152,218.083 iscore=0.09                                                                                          :turn out to be coherent.
line=4817 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=67.557,194.22,391.469,206.087 iscore=0.11                                                                     :   Evans (1995a:351) documents non-human    demoted  subjects, both animate and
line=4818 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.598,181.269,391.509,192.242 iscore=0.17                                                              :inanimate, inﬂecting like locations. In the examples provided by Evans the demoted
line=4819 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.598,168.378,391.499,180.653 iscore=0.08                                          :subject DPs are inﬂectionally equivalent to locations encoded as case:locative DPs
line=4820 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1,AGHKAC+AdvP49A1D-7.2,AGHKIA+AdvPi1-11.4 bbox=57.588,155.428,391.558,167.343 iscore=0.12:below VPâ  (on which see Appendix B, }B.1.2), the key fact being that they inﬂect for
line=4821 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8 bbox=57.657,142.545,391.548,154.82 iscore=0.25                                                                       :any tama  value. So: both literal locations and non-human demoted subjects can be
line=4822 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHKAC+AdvP49A1D-7.2 bbox=57.657,129.546,391.495,141.869 iscore=0.23                                                 :encoded  as case:locative daughters of VPâ. Pursuing this further, an alternative
line=4823 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHKAB+AdvP4C4E59-9.9,AGHKAC+AdvP49A1D-7.2 bbox=57.594,116.645,391.456,129.138 iscore=0.15                           :encoding  is available for literal location DPs, as case:� daughters of VPª (on
line=4824 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1,AGHKIA+AdvPi1-11.4 bbox=57.565,103.695,391.406,115.592 iscore=0.15                     :which  see Appendix B, }B.4.1). In such instances the location DPs avoid inﬂection

doc_id=round-2013 page=138 block_id=138-9 bbox=57.6,77.825,391.699,283.92 label=bb 5059 5074
line=5059 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8 bbox=57.6,271.646,391.531,283.92                                          :available. This section details why a syntactic analysis of the facts of Kayardild tama
line=5060 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.6,258.695,391.481,269.668 iscore=0.21                     :inﬂection is preferable to an alternative which at ﬁrst glance appears plausible and
line=5061 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.62,245.804,391.56,258.804 iscore=0.33                    :perhaps even simpler, and which can be referred to as a ‘diacritic’ analysis. Under the
line=5062 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.65,232.854,391.59,243.826 iscore=0.20                                                 :diacritic analysis each DP type is associated not with a syntactic mother node but
line=5063 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.65,219.953,391.55,230.926 iscore=0.25                                                 :with a diacritic which marks it as a member of one of four classes, corresponding to
line=5064 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.65,207.062,391.531,219.337 iscore=0.19:the four possibilities for tama inﬂection. The analyses measure  up  against one
line=5065 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.65,194.112,132.361,205.084 iscore=0.08                                                :another as follows.
line=5066 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=67.609,181.221,391.57,192.193 iscore=0.09                                                :   Both analyses permit DP  types to associate idiosyncratically with the available
line=5067 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.65,168.27,391.56,180.545 iscore=0.25  :patterns of tama inﬂection, and both analyses contain a reasonable mechanism  for
line=5068 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.66,155.369,391.55,166.342 iscore=0.31                                                 :constraining the number  of attested patterns to just four types. However, under a
line=5069 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.66,142.419,391.55,153.391 iscore=0.20                                                 :syntactic analysis it also follows that the four patterns relate to one another in an
line=5070 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8 bbox=57.66,129.518,391.64,141.793 iscore=0.27                             :embedded   fashion: if pattern X involves more tama values than pattern Y, then it will
line=5071 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.719,116.567,391.699,127.54 iscore=0.31                                                :involve all the values of pattern Y, plus one or more additional value. By employing a
line=5072 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.719,103.677,391.64,114.649 iscore=0.38                                                :syntactic analysis an implicit claim is made that the embedding  of domains  is a
line=5073 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.719,90.776,391.62,101.748 iscore=0.21                     :fundamental  structural property of the Kayardild inﬂectional system. This is not the
line=5074 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.709,77.825,391.62,88.798 iscore=0.23                                                  :case under  a  diacritic analysis. To be sure, a diacritic analysis can reproduce

doc_id=round-2013 page=139 block_id=139-1 bbox=57.43,621.417,164.92,633.882 label=tt 5075 5075
line=5075 fonts=AGHJHL+AdvOT7d6df7ab.I-11.5,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.8 bbox=57.43,621.417,164.92,633.882:118    The clause and VP

doc_id=round-2013 page=139 block_id=139-2 bbox=57.42,307.5,391.46,602.718 label=tbt 5076 5098
line=5076 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.43,591.746,391.351,602.718                                                                                                     :embedding,  but it will either treat that embedding as accidental, or its non-accidental
line=5077 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8 bbox=57.43,578.795,391.361,591.07 iscore=0.21                                                                      :status will need to be stipulated. Moreover, once we consider the nature of tama
line=5078 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.43,565.904,391.351,576.877 iscore=0.07                                                             :inﬂection within embedded   VPs  it will become  clear that embedding  really is
line=5079 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.43,552.954,391.37,563.926 iscore=0.17                                                              :fundamental  to the Kayardild inﬂectional system. The diacritic analysis not only
line=5080 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.42,540.063,309.344,551.036 iscore=0.08                                                                                         :fails to express that fact but struggles even to describe the data.
line=5081 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1,AGHKIA+AdvPi1-11.4 bbox=67.379,527.112,391.38,539.387 iscore=0.07:   The details of tama inﬂection in embedded VPs are expanded upon in }5.7 next,
line=5082 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.48,514.212,391.43,525.184 iscore=0.14                                                                                          :but can be summarized  now. Unsurprisingly from the point of view of the syntactic
line=5083 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.48,501.311,391.46,513.585 iscore=0.21                                          :analysis, we ﬁnd that embedded  VPs  inherit tam features from VP  nodes above
line=5084 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.48,488.36,391.351,501.36 iscore=0.29                                  :them, and that all DPs in those embedded VPs inﬂect for such features—this includes
line=5085 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.43,475.459,391.44,487.734 iscore=0.13                                          :DPs  which normally (i.e. in a matrix clause) do not inﬂect for tama features because
line=5086 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.47,462.509,391.42,473.482 iscore=0.27                                                                                          :they are syntactically higher than the node from which those features percolate.
line=5087 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.47,449.608,391.39,460.581 iscore=0.15                                                                                          :These  facts are captured awkwardly at best under a  diacritic analysis: we must
line=5088 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.47,436.658,391.351,447.63 iscore=0.19                                                                                          :independently stipulate that DPs of any class act as if they were in a different class
line=5089 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.47,423.767,391.361,434.739 iscore=0.25                                                             :when  inside an embedded VP.  In addition, many DPs in embedded  VPs inﬂect for
line=5090 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8 bbox=57.42,410.816,391.37,423.091 iscore=0.20                                                                      :not one but two tama features (one originating from a node inside the embedded VP,
line=5091 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.42,397.925,391.37,408.898 iscore=0.31                                                                                          :and one from a node in the matrix clause). On the diacritic analysis, these DPs would
line=5092 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.42,385.034,391.361,398.035 iscore=0.19                                                            :have  to be  simultaneous members   of two  classes—two  hierarchically ordered
line=5093 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.42,372.084,391.361,385.084 iscore=0.18                                                            :classes—in which case, the very ‘classhood’ of a DP begins to behave as if it were a
line=5094 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.44,359.193,221.841,370.166 iscore=0.12                                                                                         :feature percolating down a syntactic tree.
line=5095 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=67.399,346.242,391.351,358.517 iscore=0.08                                        :   In short, a syntactic analysis of the distribution of tama inﬂection correctly treats
line=5096 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,333.352,391.39,344.324 iscore=0.08                                                                                          :domain  embedding   as something  fundamental  to the organization of Kayardild
line=5097 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,320.401,391.341,331.374 iscore=0.18                                                                                         :morphosyntax,  and  it extends without any complications  to the most complex
line=5098 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.46,307.5,309.314,318.473 iscore=0.18                                                                                           :data. Neither of these virtues is shared by the diacritic analysis.

doc_id=round-2013 page=139 block_id=139-3 bbox=57.43,275.078,245.382,288.49 label=tbbt 5099 5099
line=5099 fonts=AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-12.1,AGHLBP+AdvP445C83-10.2,AGIABA+AdvP94C9-10.8 bbox=57.43,275.078,245.382,288.49:5.7 Matrix clause tama in embedded VPs

doc_id=round-2013 page=139 block_id=139-4 bbox=57.392,87.844,391.454,266.818 label=tbbb 5100 5113
line=5100 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.43,255.846,391.361,266.818                                                                                   :This section sets out the evidence referred to above, that embedded VP nodes inherit
line=5101 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8 bbox=57.43,242.945,350.193,255.22 iscore=0.21                                                    :tama  features in a normal way, as do all of the constituents within them.
line=5102 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=67.379,229.994,391.38,240.967 iscore=0.15                                                                       :   During this section we will encounter some of the most complicated morphology
line=5103 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.42,217.094,391.351,228.066 iscore=0.12                                                                       :in Kayardild, and it will be helpful to bear in mind three key properties of Kayardild
line=5104 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1,AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-11.0 bbox=57.42,204.143,391.361,215.195 iscore=0.12                 :inﬂection: (i) because morphosyntactic feature values attach to a node n and then
line=5105 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1,AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-11.0 bbox=57.42,191.252,391.341,202.304 iscore=0.20                 :percolate down  to all subordinate nodes, a word at terminal node z will inﬂect (all
line=5106 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-11.0 bbox=57.48,178.302,391.44,189.354 iscore=0.06                                              :else equal) for all feature values which attach to all nodes that are superordinate to z;
line=5107 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-7.3,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.41,165.346,391.385,177.911 iscore=0.19                  :(ii) inﬂectional sufﬁxes generally25 appear in a linear order reﬂecting the syntactic
line=5108 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKO+AdvOT1ef757c0+20-10.4 bbox=57.464,152.395,391.454,165.395 iscore=0.12                                         :height of a feature value’s node of attachment: the closer the node of attachment is to
line=5109 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1,AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-11.0 bbox=57.464,139.504,391.395,150.556 iscore=0.19                :the terminal z, the closer to the lexical stem its corresponding sufﬁx appears; (iii) each
line=5110 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-7.3,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHKKA+AdvOT5e4d79fc-11.0 bbox=57.424,125.797,391.362,138.92 iscore=0.07:clause associates with a set TC of values for the features tama, tamt and (sometimes)
line=5111 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.421,113.695,391.382,125.97 iscore=0.31                       :+neg,  of which a word can  inﬂect either for tamt/neg or for tama but not both;
line=5112 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.421,100.794,391.382,113.069 iscore=0.18                      :(iv) a word is able to inﬂect for tamt/neg if the stem to which the sufﬁx attaches
line=5113 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.392,87.844,391.282,100.118 iscore=0.24                       :ends morphomically  in a thematic (glossed th or j), and otherwise it can inﬂect for

doc_id=round-2013 page=139 block_id=139-5 bbox=79.37,52.997,369.46,63.039 label=b 5114 5114
line=5114 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-5.9,AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-8.8,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-7.9,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-7.5,AGHKIA+AdvPi1-9.1 bbox=79.37,52.997,369.46,63.039:       25 This will be true in all examples in this section; see }2.6.4 for the exceptionality of μobl.

doc_id=round-2013 page=140 block_id=140-4 bbox=57.461,349.211,391.451,451.92 label=bt 5124 5131

doc_id=round-2013 page=141 block_id=141-2 bbox=57.352,449.608,391.362,603.613 label=ttbt 5144 5155
line=5144 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJKN+AdvP40C64E-9.3 bbox=67.38,591.746,391.342,603.613            :   The positions in Table 5.9 are shown in Figure 5.4. In Figure 5.4 and in other
line=5145 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.401,578.795,391.332,589.768 iscore=0.25                     :syntactic diagrams in this section dashed lines indicate sections of structure which
line=5146 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.401,565.904,391.362,576.877 iscore=0.25                     :have been abbreviated by skipping intermediate nodes. Without exception, the DPs
line=5147 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.401,552.954,391.362,563.926 iscore=0.21                     :which contain embedded  VPs  in Kayardild are located either above, or below, all of

line=5342 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0 bbox=57.601,351.155,391.502,362.127 iscore=0.25                                                                                         :an otherwise-empty  DP. The question is whether embedded  VPs  (which might or

line=5344 fonts=AGHJFK+AdvOT1ef757c0-11.0,AGHJGK+AdvP94BD-9.8,AGHJMP+AdvOT1ef757c0+fb-7.1 bbox=57.601,325.313,391.512,337.588 iscore=0.33                                         :predicate DPs. Equipped with the understanding of tama inﬂection developed above,
